item.description:
Only $5 for Let's share Thanksgiving dinner together, I can fit 25 people in my community room in Wethersfield. I am making a 20 lb turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes, sweet potatoes, carrots, salad, green bean casserole and gravy, apple pie and ice cream just need your beverage, appetizer or dessert. thanks

Nancy

Questions, Please call or email me

thanks

Nancy......her cell....508-380-3737.......email soulpart@aol.com.....
item.how_to_find_us: community room, still room for more

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: thanksgiving dinner only $5 at my apt in wethersfield on prospect st
